description: Covers simple linear regression models with individual (50%) and group (50%) components involving data analysis, numerical/short-answer questions. Topics from weeks 1-2.
Focuses on general linear models with individual (50%) and group (50%) components. Includes data analysis and applied questions using content from weeks 3-5.
Addresses model selection and diagnostics in linear models with individual (50%) and group (50%) components. Covers material from weeks 5-8.
2-hour individual examination covering all course content (lectures, tutorials, labs, assignments). Assesses theoretical understanding and applied skills.
